intra-switch-policy.help: Allow any traffic between switch interfaces or require firewall policies to allow traffic between switch interfaces.
intra-switch-policy.name: intra-switch-policy

options.help: Traffic between switch members is implicitly allowed.
options.name: implicit

options.help: Traffic between switch members must match firewall policies.
options.name: explicit

mac-ttl.help: Duration for which MAC addresses are held in the ARP table (300 - 8640000 sec, default = 300).
mac-ttl.name: mac-ttl

member.help: Names of the interfaces that belong to the virtual switch.
member.name: member

name.help: Interface name (name cannot be in use by any other interfaces, VLANs, or inter-VDOM links).
name.name: name

span.help: Enable/disable port spanning. Port spanning echoes traffic received by the software switch to the span destination port.
span.name: span

span-dest-port.help: SPAN destination port name. All traffic on the SPAN source ports is echoed to the SPAN destination port.
span-dest-port.name: span-dest-port

span-direction.help: The direction in which the SPAN port operates, either: rx, tx, or both.
span-direction.name: span-direction

options.help: Copies only received packets from source SPAN ports to the destination SPAN port.
options.name: rx

options.help: Copies only transmitted packets from source SPAN ports to the destination SPAN port.
options.name: tx

options.help: Copies both received and transmitted packets from source SPAN ports to the destination SPAN port.
options.name: both

span-source-port.help: Physical interface name. Port spanning echoes all traffic on the SPAN source ports to the SPAN destination port.
span-source-port.name: span-source-port

type.help: Type of switch based on functionality: switch for normal functionality, or hub to duplicate packets to all port members.
type.name: type

options.help: Switch for normal switch functionality (available in NAT mode only).
options.name: switch

options.help: Hub to duplicate packets to all member ports.
options.name: hub

vdom.help: VDOM that the software switch belongs to.
vdom.name: vdom

results.help: Configure software switch interfaces by grouping physical and WiFi interfaces.
results.name: switch-interface
